response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $8,000 by both myself and you, ensuring a perfect match for your requirements. I kindly propose to offer it to you for $7,200, providing you with an opportunity to acquire it at a highly competitive price. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your budget and preferences. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 7200}
